articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to May 11 Smeltery
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to May 11 Smeltery
Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the May 11 Smeltery rebuilt on an expansion basis.
					After being briefed on the smeltery in front of a large map showing its panoramic view, he went round production processes including a control room and a smelting shop to acquaint himself in detail with the technological updating and production there.
					
					Seeing the work sites furnished with ultra-modern equipment and pervaded with clean and fresh air, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the officials, workers and technicians of the smeltery successfully completed the difficult and vast expansion project in a brief span of time by devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm and highly estimated their feats. 
					
					The May 11 Smeltery, a successful embodiment of the Juche idea, is a modern smeltery impeccable in all aspects, he said, noting with great pleasure that one more model industrial establishment sprang up in the era of Songun to shine long in the history of the country.
					
					It is a big success to be greatly proud of that the officials, technicians and workers of the smeltery put on a modern basis the smeltery to fully meet the requirements of the IT era by settling by themselves the scientific and technological problems before them, he said, calling upon all the units to earnestly learn from their revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and work style of inquiring into and creating something new with their efforts and wisdom.
					
					Noting that dynamic progress made in the comprehensive technological updating at the industrial establishments in recent years resulted in remarkably augmenting the might of the Juche industry, he added: We are sure to emerge victorious in building a great prosperous and powerful nation as there is such strong independent industrial foundation we have laid with much effort, tightening our belts.
					
					He set forth the important tasks to be fulfilled by the smeltery.
					
					Saying that the smeltery will turn into a comprehensive smelting centre, when the project for increasing its capacity envisaged in the next phase completed, he underscored the need to make thorough-going preparations for it and wind up it in a brief span of time. He indicated the orientation and ways to do so.
					
					He expressed conviction that the officials, workers and technicians of the May 11 Smeltery would live up to the profound trust and great expectation of the Party by successfully carrying out the revolutionary tasks before it. 
					
					He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the WPK Central Committee, and Generals of the Korean People's Army Kim Won Hong, Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Music Skit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Music Skit
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed music skit "Our Dear Ones Have Become Heroes" together with servicepersons.
					The music skit, created by creators and artistes of the Kangwon Provincial Art Troupe, deals with how women in Kumgang Village aided the front during the last Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					The performers made vivid depiction of the history of great victory in which the front and the rear and the army and the people became an integrated whole and fought hard to defend the independence of the country and the gains of the revolution in the grim war against the imperialist aggressors. They also strikingly manifested the unshakable faith and will of the army and the people to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with the might of the army-people unity and achieve final victory in the sacred struggle for prosperity of the socialist homeland.
					
					At the end of the performance Kim Jong Il warmly acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the performers and audience and congratulated the performers upon the successful performance.
					
					He appreciated the efforts of the creators and artistes, expressing satisfaction over the fact that they produced the peculiar work of high cognitive and educational value.
					
					Noting that the artistes of the Kangwon Provincial Art Troupe have greatly contributed to educating the party members and other working people in a revolutionary way through revolutionary art activities over the past years, he highly estimated their feats. And he set forth tasks to be fulfilled in conducting more dynamic art creation and activities.
					
					 Among the audience were Chief Secretary of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the WPK Ri Chol Bong, Secretary of the WPK Central Committee Kim Ki Nam, department directors, first vice department directors and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee and KPA Generals Kim Won Hong, Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Jang Song U
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Jang Song U
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Tuesday sent a wreath to the bier of KPA Vice Marshal Jang Song U, member of the WPK Central Committee, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Observed
Pyongyang August 25 (KCNA) -- A concert was given by the State Symphony Orchestra at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to mark the 49th anniversary of General Secretary
					Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Among the audience were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and  power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including orchestral music "General on a Galloping White Horse" and "The Glow over Kangson", string ensemble for pizzicato "This Country Is So Good" and female tenor solo "Song of a Frontranker in the Chollima Movement".
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of the greatness of Kim Jong Il demonstrating the might of Juche Korea, an independent power, to the whole world by leading the struggle for defending socialism and building a great prosperous and powerful nation to victory.
					
					On the same day performances were given by artistes of the Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble and the Mansudae Art Troupe and members of the art group of the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace and acrobatic performances were given by artistes of the Pyongyang Circus and the Pyongyang Moranbong Circus. Art performances also took place at theaters in local areas.
					
					 Dancing parties of youth and students took place in different parts of the country and a dancing party of officials and members of the women's union at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph here.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Editorially Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Editorially Observed
Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Leading papers Tuesday editorially observe the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership. They say that his nearly half a century-long history of Songun revolutionary leadership is a glorious history of revolutionary activities of a peerless strategist and statesman and invincible and iron-willed commander.
					Rodong Sinmun notes that the history of his Songun revolutionary leadership is a glorious history in which he has developed the Korean People's Army into a main force of the revolution and invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu, a sacred history in which he has consolidated the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks in every way with the KPA as the core and a history in which he has brought about a great surge in socialist construction by giving full play to the mental power of all the servicepersons and people.
					
					It goes on:
					
					Under the care of Kim Jong Il the KPA has grown to be an army strong in idea and faith as all its servicepersons are replete with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and it is pervaded with a revolutionary commanding system and military discipline and the best elite revolutionary army in which they are fully prepared as a-match-for-a hundred fighters fully equipped with modern weapons.
					
					He has achieved the perfect unity of the army and people in thinking and fighting traits with the KPA as a model and core as required by the Songun era, thereby putting the single-minded unity of the DPRK on a new higher level.
					
					The DPRK is the only country in the world in which the army and people based on comradeship are carving out a rosy future with the might of a harmonious whole.
					
					It is Kim Jong Il who worked out bold plans, always looking far into the distant future of the country and nation with his clairvoyant insight and brought about a great leap forward in socialist construction with his extraordinary leadership mode of giving full play to the mental power of the army and people.
					
					The stirring reality in which the centuries-old desire of the Korean people is becoming a brilliant reality is a striking demonstration of the validity of Songun revolutionary leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and its inexhaustible vitality.
					
					Minju Joson stresses that the WPK's plan and intention to surely open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, will become a brilliant reality thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il and high revolutionary enthusiasm and creative ingenuity of all the servicepersons and people all out in the drive to build a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Authors Lots of Works
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Authors Lots of Works
Pyongyang August 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il has authored and published lots of famous works developing and enriching the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, the Songun idea, through his tireless ideological and theoretical activities over the last nearly five decades since he started his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					Many of his works were published as collections of his works and pamphlets including Vol. 1~15 of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il", Vol. 1~10 of "Accomplishing Juche Revolutionary Cause" and "On the Military Idea and the Songun Politics of Our Party".
					
					Those works are the results of Kim Jong Il's endless thinking, inquiry and wisdom and energies he has devoted to accomplishing the Songun revolutionary cause of the Workers' Party of Korea and developing the revolutionary armed forces with his rare insight and serve as an encyclopedia which comprehensively deals with great Songun idea and theory.
					
					His works scientifically clarify the Songun revolutionary line run through with the Songun idea, something never known to mankind before, and its brilliant embodiment, the principles of the Songun politics and tasks and ways for implementing them and give perfect answers to the theoretical and practical questions arising in all fields including politics, military affairs, economy and culture.
					
					Kim Jong Il published work "'Let Us Defend with Our Very Lives the Party Central Committee Headed by Respected Comrade Kim Il Sung!', The People's Army Should Put Up This Slogan Higher" on Aug. 25, Juche 49 (1960), when he started his Songun revolutionary leadership.  In this work he noted that defending the Party and leader with our lives provides a decisive guarantee for the victory of the Korean revolution and set forth tasks to be fulfilled by the People' Army to dynamically conduct combat and political trainings under the slogan of devotedly defending the leader.
					
					He in his works published recently including "The Workers of Kangson Should Take the Lead in the Drive for Effecting a New Great Revolutionary Surge in Building a Great Prosperous and Powerful Nation" called on the army and the people of the DPRK to bring about a new great revolutionary surge in the drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Party.
					
					The works evoked great response among the revolutionary parties and progressives in the world for their profound ideas and theories. At least 354,000 copies of them were translated into nearly 70 languages and came off the press in about 80 countries in the new century.
					
					 There were more than 500 activities for studying and distributing the works in at least 120 countries and regions in 2006. The following year witnessed a total of more than 600 events of diverse forms in at least 130 countries and regions. And 2008 saw at least 3,000 functions held in over 150 countries and regions for the same purpose.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Service to Increasing Political and Military Strength
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Service to Increasing Political and Military Strength
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has been demonstrating its dignity as an invincible socialist power century after century under the banner of Songun.
					Its dignity and invincible might as an independent country are guaranteed by the powerful political and military capabilities.
					
					On the occasion of the 49th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership, the soldiers and people of the DPRK are recollecting the immortal feats he has performed in strengthening the political and military power of the country incomparably with his outstanding leadership.
					
					 He has increased the political and military might of the DPRK in every way in the whole period of his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					It is entirely thanks to the energetic guidance of Kim Jong Il for consolidating the country's political and military strength that the DPRK won a victory in the struggle for defending socialism and ushered in the grandiose era for building a great, prosperous and powerful nation in Korea.
					
					 He, attaching great importance to ideology, has paid primary attention to establishing a monolithic ideology in the Party, army and revolutionary ranks.
					
					As a result, the Korean people could grow to be revolutionaries powerful in the revolutionary spirit and the might of unity and the Korean People's Army could develop into an invincible one strong in ideology and confidence.
					
					In order to cement the political and military capabilities of the DPRK, he has advanced the revolution and construction with the People's Army as the pillar, the main force of the country.
					
					 During the Songun leadership he has attached a great importance to the position and role of the KPA and directed primary efforts to strengthen the military power. He was the first in history who put forth an army-building program centering on the leader and trained the KPA as an army of the leader and the Party and a strong pillar for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and building a rich and powerful nation.
					
					He, holding fast to the principle of self-defense, has built up the national defense capabilities in an original way.
					
					Taking the Juche-oriented defense industry, a valuable heritage of President Kim Il Sung, as the lifeline for the construction of a powerful socialist nation, he has regarded it as an unshakable belief that the Korean style, the Juche-oriented way, is best and the strength of the Korean people is most reliable and has consistently maintained it in increasing defense capabilities.
					
					True to the seasoned Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, the DPRK will, in the future, too, display its might as an invincible political, ideological and military power.

articles.title: Staff Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Staff Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and staff members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill Tuesday on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the AINDF.
					They paid tribute to the President after laying a basket of flowers before the statue with deep reverence for him.

articles.title: Staff Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Staff Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Suk
Pyongyang August 25 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and staff members of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front Tuesday visited the bust of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine, at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and paid tribute to her on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the founding of the AINDF.
					They laid bunches of flowers before the bust of Kim Jong Suk, woman commander of Mt. Paektu, and paid tribute to her, recollecting her noble revolutionary career and undying feats.
					
					On the same day they visited the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery and placed bouquets before the graves of the martyrs who struggled for the founding, consolidation and development of the AINDF.

articles.title: Taedong River-Crossing Contest Held
articles.content:
Taedong River-Crossing Contest Held
 Pyongyang August 25 (KCNA) -- The Taedong River-crossing contest of school youth and children in Pyongyang took place on Tuesday to mark Youth Day.
					 Participating in the contest, held in the riverside adjacent to Kim Il Sung Square, were over 1,500 boy and girl players selected from schools in districts and counties of the city.
					
					 When the start of the contest was declared, all the players began swimming vigorously toward the opposite riverside, displaying a high degree of collectivism and untiring perseverance.
					
					 The winners of the contest were players from Rangnang District and Sangwon County.

articles.title: Suchon Mineral Spring
articles.content:
Suchon Mineral Spring
Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Korea is endowed with lots of famous mineral springs.
					The Suchon mineral spring in Sophyong-ri, Suan County of North Hwanghae Province is well known for its medicinal properties.
					
					It is a sodium bicarbonate and calcium spring. It contains 2.2 grams of mineral matters, 2 grams of free carbonic acid and 61.22 milligrams of meta silicic acid per liter. Its main ion elements per liter are 1,586 milligrams of bicarbonate ion, 383.37 milligrams of sodium ion, 99.2 milligrams of calcium ion, 59.58 milligrams of magnesium ion and 7.26 milligrams of iron ion.
					
					The temperature is 8 degrees C, pH value is 6.3 and the daily amount of eruption is 2.9 cubic meters.
					
					It is a weak acid carbonated spring which controls gastric juice, promotes urination and intensifies metabolism.
					
					It is efficacious for the treatment of chronic gastritis, gastric and duodenal ulcer, chronic enteritis and colitis, chronic hepatitis, chronic cholecystitis and bile duct inflammation, chronic pyelitis and cystitis, urinary passage lithiasis, chronic bronchitis, chronic pharyngitis, slight diabetes, gout, hyperuricemia and others.
					
					It is also good for allergic dermatitis.
					
					The government has directed attention to the mineral spring so that a sanatorium was built near it for the health promotion of the people.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Militaristic Hysteria Flayed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Militaristic Hysteria Flayed
Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Japan is becoming vocal asserting the examination of the exercise of its "right of collective self-defense" and the need to bolster the "Japan-U.S. security system" in such a manner that it can "intercept a missile launched by north Korea towards the United States" by its own armed forces.
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard: This betrays the Japanese reactionaries' scenario to stage a comeback to Korea which has reached a danger line. 
					
					It goes on:
					
					Whether to allow the exercise of the "right of collective self-defense" or not serves as a barometer judging whether Japan embarks upon the road of aggression or not. 
					
					Japan's claim that it is necessary to examine the ban on exercising the above-said right for the purpose of "intercepting a missile flying towards the U.S." sounds just the same as the assertion that it will set out to reinvade Korea with the backing of the U.S. 
					
					Japan is keen to use its "support to the U.S." under the pretext of coping with the non-existent "military threat" from the DPRK as an all-purpose lever for attaining its reinvasion goal.
					
					It is Japan's calculation that it can do anytime whatever it wants by disguising its military actions for aggression as "peace-keeping" activities if it uses its "support to the U.S." under the pretext of coping with the DPRK's "military threat" as a card.
					
					That is why the Japanese reactionaries are rushing headlong into a war while vociferating about the exercise of the "right of collective self-defense" under the pretext of somebody's "military threat" and the strengthened "Japan-U.S. security system".
					
					Noting that the theory of "intercepting a missile" touted by the Japanese reactionaries amounts to one on preemptive strike at the DPRK, the commentary stresses that the army and people of the DPRK will bolster the might of Songun in every way and thus foil the Japanese militarists' wild dream to reinvade Korea.

articles.title: Materialization of NAM's Idea Called for
articles.content:
Materialization of NAM's Idea Called for
Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- If the Non-aligned Movement is to dynamically advance, it is necessary to invariably hold fast to the basic idea of independence against imperialism and peace against war and materialize it to the letter, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed article carried on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of the DPRK's joining the NAM.
					It goes on:
					
					The DPRK's joining the NAM marked a very important occasion in injecting vitality into the unity of the movement and its strengthening and development and putting spurs to its dynamic advance along the road of independence against imperialism and peace against war, guided by its basic idea.
					
					Thanks to the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung the danger of division created by the imperialists in the NAM in the past was removed and it could protect its idea and dynamically advance in conformity with its noble mission and objective.
					
					The undying feats the President performed in strengthening and developing the NAM and carrying out the cause of global independence remain shining as ever thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					He has made sure that the national power of the country was increased in every way with the might of the Songun politics and peace and security on the Korean Peninsula were defended with powerful war deterrent, thereby making a great contribution to the cause of the NAM to achieve independence, peace and social progress and prosperity.
					
					In order to protect the sovereignty of the nation and peace and security at the present stage where a fair international order desired by the NAM has not been rounded off and in the present world where the imperialist forces are using military blackmail and nuclear threat as an all-powerful lever for enforcing a strong-arm policy, it is necessary to have in place military deterrent for self-defence. This is a conclusion drawn by the DPRK in the fierce confrontation with imperialism.
					
					The DPRK will as ever work hard to boost the unity and solidarity with the non-aligned countries in the idea of independence, peace and friendship and defend the sovereignty of the country, stability on the Korean Peninsula and peace in Asia and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang August 25 (KCNA) -- The Russian Nakhodka Format Publishing House brought out in booklet General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					The work, published on April 18, Juche 87(1998), clarifies the five-point policy for great national unity which would serve as important guidelines for achieving the great unity of the whole nation. This policy laid down in the work calls for achieving great national unity strictly on the principle of national independence, uniting under the banner of patriotism and national reunification, improving the inter-Korean relations, struggling against outside forces and traitors to the nation in league with them, developing dialogue, letting all Koreans visit each other and boost solidarity and alliance, etc.

articles.title: Just Cause of Korean People Supported
articles.content:
Just Cause of Korean People Supported
Pyongyang August 25 (KCNA) -- Ella Rule, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) expressed his full support for the just cause of the Korean people.
					In his Iranian Press TV appearance on August 16 he refuted the recent wrong view of the West on the DPRK, adding that the DPRK does not pose any threat to anybody and its war deterrent reliably guarantees the peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Asia
					
					The DPRK had access to nuclear weapons because of the U.S. ceaseless nuclear threat and hostile policy towards it, he noted, and continued: 
					
					The DPRK has not only built up strong capability for self-defence including nuclear weapons but all its people are put under arms and they will turn out as one to defend the socialist country in single-minded unity in contingency.
					
					The Korean people have striven hard to achieve national reunification since the division of the country.
					
					The DPRK put forward not a few realistic and just proposals for reunification including the federal formula based on one nation, one state, two systems and two governments.
					
					Korea's reunification is sure to be achieved according to the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige Fundicion de Metales No Ferrosos 11 de Mayo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige Fundicion de Metales No Ferrosos 11 de Mayo
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la reconstruida y ampliada Fundicion de Metales No Ferrosos 11 de Mayo.
					Despues de escuchar explicaciones ante el plano de esa fabrica, recorrio los procesos productivos como la sala de mando y el de la fundicion de metales no ferrosos enterandose detalladamente del estado de reconstruccion tecnica y produccion.
					
					Al ver los talleres donde se respira el aire puro y fresco y funcionan los equipos ultramodernos, evaluo altamente los meritos de los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos mostrandose muy contento de que ellos hayan terminado con exito en un corto tiempo la dificil y enorme obra de reconstruccion y ampliacion haciendo uso de su inteligencia y pasion.
					
					La Fundicion de Metales No Ferrosos 11 de Mayo, en que fue materializada brillantemente la idea Juche, es la planta magnifica y perfecta en todos los aspectos, dijo el Dirigente y volvio a ponerse satisfecho por la aparicion de esta otra fabrica ejemplar de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) que se registrara para siempre en los anales de la patria.
					
					Es un gran exito digno de enorgullecerse que los funcionarios, tecnicos y obreros construyeron esta magnifica fundicion de metales no ferrosos, que satisface las demandas de la era de informatizacion, solucionando por cuenta propia los problemas cientifico-tecnicos surgidos, apunto.
					
					Es necesario que todas las unidades aprendan el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza y el modo de lucha de aquellos que investigan y crean lo nuevo con la fuerza e inteligencia propias, subrayo.
					
					Gracias al energico impulso de la reconstruccion tecnica general de los ultimos anos en las fabricas y empresas, aumento considerablemente el poderio de la industria del Juche, asevero y continuo que es definitivo el triunfo de nuestra causa de construccion de una gran potencia prospera porque contamos con esa gigantesca base de industria independiente que hemos sentado con ingentes esfuerzos aguantando la escasez economica.
					
					El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que incumben a la fabrica.
					
					Vaticino que si termina hasta la obra de ampliacion de la capacidad prevista en la proxima etapa, esta empresa se convertira en la base de fundicion universal.
					
					Por lo tanto, hay que impulsar con esmero los preparativos para terminar en un corto tiempo la obra de proxima etapa, senalo y enseno la direccion y los remedios para este fin.
					
					El Dirigente expreso su conviccion de que los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de aqui responderan a la gran confianza y esperanza del partido con el cumplimiento satisfactorio de las tareas revolucionarias presentadas ante su empresa.
					
					En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Kim Won Hong, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia la cancion y narracion "Mi esposo se hizo heroe"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia la cancion y narracion "Mi esposo se hizo heroe"
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, disfruto junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC la cancion y narracion "Mi esposo se hizo heroe".
					Esta pieza, creada por los creadores y artistas del Conjunto Artistico de la Provincia de Kangwon, se trata de lo que hicieron las mujeres de la aldea a la orilla del rio Kum para ayudar a los soldados en el frente durante la pasada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (junio de 1950-julio de 1953).
					
					En este espectaculo, los artistas mostraron vividamente la historia del gran triunfo que escribieron el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea combatiendo como un solo hombre en el frente y la retaguardia para defender la independencia de la patria y las conquistas de la revolucion durante esa encarnizada guerra contra los agresores imperialistas.
					
					Tambien, demostraron patentemente la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de llevar a feliz termino con el poderio de la unidad entre si mismos la causa revolucionaria del Juche y alcanzar la victoria final en la sagrada lucha por la prosperidad de la patria socialista.
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Dirigente respondio cordialmente a la aclamacion hospitalaria de los ejecutantes y espectadores y felicito el exito de este espectaculo.
					
					Aprecio los esfuerzos de los creadores y artistas mostrandose satisfecho de que ellos hayan creado esta obra original de gran valor perceptivo y educativo.
					
					Evaluo altamente los meritos de los artistas del Conjunto Artistico de la Provincia de Kangwon diciendo que ellos han contribuido mucho en el pasado a educar de manera revolucionaria a los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores mediante sus actividades artisticas revolucionarias. 
					
					Y presento las tareas que se presentan para dinamizar la creacion y actividades artisticas.
					
					En esta ocasion estuvieron presentes tambien el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Kangwon, Ri Chol Bong, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes y primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, y otros cuadros directivos, los comandantes del ejercito incluyendo los generales de ejercito del EPC, Kim Won Hong, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Jang Song U
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Jang Song U
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio el dia 25 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Jang Song U, miembro del CC del PTC y vicemariscal del EPC, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Festividades por 49o aniversario del inicio de la direccion del Songun
articles.content:
Festividades por 49o aniversario del inicio de la direccion del Songun
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ATCC) -- En ocasion del aniversario 49 del inicio de la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun (priorizacion militar), la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional ofrecio el dia 25 el concierto festivo en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo.
					Lo presenciaron los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, fuerzas armadas, poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del EPC, asi como trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					En la escena se pusieron la musica orquestal "General corre a caballo blanco" y "Arreboles en Kangson", la orquesta de cuerda para pizzicato "Es mejor este territorio", el solo masculino "Contara el amor del soldado" y el soprano "Cancion del precursor Chollima" y otras piezas.
					
					Los ejecutantes elogiaron altamente la noble personalidad del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien al conducir al triunfo la batalla por la defensa del socialismo y la construccion de la gran potencia prospera, exalta a todo el mundo el poderio de la Corea del Juche, potente pais de la independencia.
					
					El mismo dia,  tuvieron lugar las funciones festivas de los artistas del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae y los miembros del grupo artistico del Palacio de Ninos y Escolares de Pyongyang y las funciones acrobaticas de los artistas del Conjunto Circense de Pyongyang y del Conjunto Circense Morambong de Pyongyang.
					
					 Tambien, similares actividades hubo en los teatros locales.
					
					 Por otra parte, se efectuaron los bailes de los jovenes y estudiantes en distintos lugares y el baile de las funcionarias y miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea en la plaza del Arco Triunfal de Pyongyang.

articles.title: Periodicos publican editoriales por el 25 de agosto
articles.content:
Periodicos publican editoriales por el 25 de agosto
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos publicaron en sus ediciones de hoy los editoriales dedicados al 49o aniversario del inicio de la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun (priorizacion militar).
					Esta historia de direccion de casi medio siglo, que data del 25 de agosto de 1960, deviene la sagrada cronica revolucionaria del Dirigente, politico sin par e invencible comandante de acero, destacan los editoriales.
					
					Durante esa trayectoria gloriosa y sagrada, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il fortalecio el Ejercito Popular de Corea como grueso de la revolucion e invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias del monte Paektu, consolido por todos los medios la unidad monolitica de las filas revolucionarias teniendo al EPC como su nucleo y trajo el tiempo de incesante ascenso de la construccion socialista empleando la potencia espiritual de todos los militares y habitantes.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun y prosigue:
					
					Gracias a la orientacion del Dirigente, el EPC se formo como el ejercito fuerte en la idea y conviccion en que reina el espiritu de defensa a costa de la vida al lider y se establecieron cabalmente el revolucionario sistema de direccion militar y la disciplina militar.
					
					Ademas, se prepararon como aguerridos combatientes capaces de hacer frente a solas a cien enemigos todos los efectivos de esas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de flor y nata que cuentan con modernos armamentos. 
					
					El Dirigente realizo la identidad del ejercito y el pueblo en la idea y el espiritu de lucha presentando al EPC como modelo y nucleo conforme a la demanda de la epoca del Songun, de modo que se elevara en el nivel mas alto la unidad monolitica.
					
					Corea es el unico pais en que el ejercito y el pueblo forjan su futuro maravilloso con el poderio de la unidad monolitica entrelazandose con la camaraderia.
					
					El Dirigente traza siempre los proyectos ambiciosos previendo con su gran perspicacia hasta el lejano futuro de la patria y la nacion y trajo un auge trascendental en la construccion socialista con su extraordinario modo de direccion que hace al ejercito y al pueblo usar toda su potencia espiritual.
					
					La realidad emocionante de hoy, cuando se realiza con brillantez el deseo secular del pueblo coreano, deviene la muestra evidente de la justeza y la inagotable vitalidad de la direccion revolucionaria del Songun del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Por otra parte, el periodico Minju Joson destaca que gracias a la guia del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, el alto entusiasmo revolucionario y creativo de todo el ejercito y el pueblo levantados en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera, se realizaran brillantemente el proyecto y el proposito del PTC de abrir a toda costa de par en par las puertas a la gran potencia prospera en 2012 cuando se cumple el centenario de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
